posts.title: Trump officials to ask supreme court to halt ‘activist judge’s’ bid to block tariffs
top_comments: These activist judges voted unanimously. One appointed by Obama, one Regan, and one ... you guessed it, Trump.

>On Thursday, the Trump administration filed for “emergency relief” from the ruling “to avoid the irreparable national-security and economic harms at stake” The administration will appeal only if a federal court declines to temporarily pause the tariff ruling.

OK. Define the national-security and economic harms. And be specific.

“You’re supposed to always give us what we want, never ask for anything in return, and never complain, otherwise you’re hurting our feelings. Especially when you call me a taco.” Malignant narcissism has taken over our government.

If all the president has to do is to declare that there is some dramatic emergency, and then start swinging tariffs wildly, Congress has been rendered impotent. I hope the Supreme Court justices, or at least five of them, can see that that is a terrible misreading of the clear terms of the constitution.
Yes those "activist judges" appointed by Presidents Reagan and Trump.
I love how they are “activist” for doing their job. It’s the TRADE court FFS 🤦‍♂️

The activist Judge is actually 3 Judges and of those 3 judges 1 was appointed by Reagan and another one appointed by Trump himself and the rulling was unanimous so at least 2 out of the 3 judges were Appointed by conservative presidents but the moment he they rule against him their activist. 

  
Hmmm.
“I need you to be activist judges to stop the activist judges”
I like the rights adoption of the term activist judges considering the current state of the supreme court.
Supreme Court care more about their money than pleasing Trump. I could see them upholding the ruling.

posts.title: A South African woman is sentenced to life in prison for selling her young daughter
top_comments: A woman testified during the trial that Smith had told her she and the two men had sold Joshlin for around $1,000 to a traditional healer who wanted the child for her body parts.

In South Africa, it is called "Muti".

Witchdoctors are unfortunately still a thing in rural parts.

I followed the entire case through CapeTalk's coverage - and I 100% agree with the court - the judge was extremely sympathetic to the defendant and state - and he held the trial in the community multi-purpose centre, ensuring the community feels part of the trial as well.


The NPA did really good work here.

Unfortunately Joshlin is dead - I am 99% sure of this, since albino kids are highly sought after for their organs and skin.

The boyfriend and friend's friend are absolute trash, and the lady who ratted on them are trash as well for not coming forward earlier. Fuck them.

Joshlin's grandmother fought tooth and nail to get custody of Joshlin and her siblings before this happened, but the social services failed spectacularly - the grandma said that Joshlin's mother made their lives hell and abused and neglected all the kids - but still she retained custody for some ungodly reason.

This is a failure of state and a testament to the fact that South Africa do not care about their children - every day there's a story of a child found raped and murdered under some bush, and still nothing is being done by the government.
So uhhh where's Joshlin? Where is this "healer?"

She was 6 years old. Six years spent growing, developing a personality and being at the mercy of and surely loving her mother. Her mother who then sold her for $1000. Beyond cruel. Unimaginable. And still not found a year later. I really hope her suffering was short. There aren’t words for this type of cruelty towards a child.

I'm speechless a parent would do that to their own child. 

Just horrifying that someone would sell a child to be murdered. 

I have three little girls 5 is the oldest. When I tell them monsters aren't real, I'm lying. They are real, they just don't look like what they expect.
This literally made my stomach turn. Wtaf?!
I saw a documentary about albinos being killed for ritualistic purposes. This one dude was like let them try me, all the while swinging two machetes around…. Wild stuff

I found out one of my childhood friends got all fucked up on meth & got caught trying to sell his kid.

Who knew Northern MN and S. Africa had so much in common.

As a South African I’m disgusted by this woman’s actions and how she played to courts and society in the beginning. 

Karma will not be kind to her. 

The community needs to find the muti doctors and do kangaroo court with them as the police are not effective.

posts.title: Man who blamed exposure to far-right content gets 3 years for threatening election officials
top_comments: “It wasn’t my fault - I listened to people who claimed they’re the party of personal responsibility- how can *I* be blamed for my actions?”

>A judge sentenced a man who blamed exposure to far-right extremist content for motivating his online threats to kill Democratic election officials in Colorado and Arizona to three years in prison Thursday, saying the penalty for such “keyboard terrorism” needed to be serious enough to deter others from doing the same.

>U.S. District Judge S. Kato Crews said that threats against election and other government officials are on the rise and people need to remember that differences need to be worked out through the democratic process, not violence.

>“The public must not accept this as the norm,” he said in handing down the sentence for Teak Ty Brockbank.

>Brockbank pleaded guilty in October to making threats between September 2021 and August 2022 against Colorado Secretary of State Jena Griswold and former Arizona Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, who is now governor. He also threatened a Colorado judge and federal agents.

>Brockbank apologized in court for his “ugly posts” and said he has turned away from the fear, hate and anger that he found online that derailed his life.

>Federal prosecutors sought three years in prison for Brockbank. He asked for leniency, saying he made the posts when he was drinking heavily, socially isolated and spending his evenings consuming conspiracy theories online. Jonathan Jacobson, a Washington-based trial attorney for the Justice Department’s public integrity section, pointed out that the threats continued during a period when Brockbank wasn’t drinking.

>Brockbank posted online that Colorado’s top election official should “Hang by the neck” and her former counterpart in Arizona should also be put to death.

Keyboard warrior or not, the nutcase deserves what he got, and then some.
Trump will pardon him.  As long as he broke the law to protect the fascist state trump will pardon him.

It is a baseless and vindictive legal maneuver designed to re-victimize, shift blame and discourage others from coming forward*.”

The Robinsons counter-suit is just a way to silence people who sue. Robinson's spending money on these housekeepers has zero to do with proving himself innocent of sexual assaults,  That's just more bull.

>The filing says the women “stayed with the Robinsons year after year,” vacationed with them, celebrated holidays with them, exchanged gifts with them, asked for tickets to his concerts, and sought and received help from them including money for dental surgery, financial support for a disabled family member, and “even a car.”

Yeah because an alleged predator never, ever had duplicitous behavior or acted generously toward one of their victims.

Oh no the new manuals have overdrive. Um six speeds still plugging along
Id rather learn to drive a stick than be stuck with one of Nissans automatic transmissions.

Terrible news, manuals are so much more fun but offered in so few vehicles in the U.S. Sometimes you just have to have fun with the stick, especially when it has a nice comfortable protective cover over the knob to get full control as driving was intended, nobody likes a premature gear shift
This is the last Nissan manual.  VW still offers it.
That sucks. I recently bought a 2017 Civic Si with a 6 speed manual and I love it. Kinda annoying in traffic, but so fun to drive. I don’t want to go back.
I mean, is there any advantage of a 5 speed over a 6 speed besides lower production cost anyways?

posts.title: Harrison Ruffin Tyler, grandson of the 10th U.S. president, dies at 96
top_comments:
>Tyler told Virginia Tech Magazine in 2007 that he and co-founder William Simmons had three goals: "sell a product that works, hire good employees, and take care of those employees." They made the company an Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP) in 1989, and their employees gained controlling interest when they retired in 2000.

Sounds like a decent chap. Godspeed.

Just so everyone is aware, because this has always been one of my favorite stories:

Harrison Tyler was the last living grandson of John Tyler, the tenth President of the United States, who was President from 1841-1845.  

Yes, someone who was President of the United States 180 years ago had a grandson who was still alive until a few days ago. And President John Tyler was born in 1790, during George Washington's first Presidential term.

Harrison's brother Lyon died just five years ago.

This has always been one of those fun facts that blew me away.  R. I. P. Harrison.

For context: 

- Grandfather was John Tyler (1790-1862)
- Father was Lyon Gardiner Tyler (1853-1935)
- Harrison Ruffin Tyler (1928-2025)

John had Lyon at age 63 and Lyon had Harrison at age 75. 

John had 15 kids with two different women. His first wife died in 1842 and he remarried two years later to someone 30 years younger. 

Lyon then had 6 kids with two different women. His first wife died in 1921 and he remarried nine years later to someone 35 years younger. 

Harrison broke the trend only having 3 kids and he didn't remarry after his wife died in 2019, although by that point he was 91 and suffering from dementia.
So who's the oldest president with living grandchildren now? Must have jumped quite a bit.

I know everyone is gonna make jokes but even if you smoke weed accidentally taking a large edible dose when you don't expect to will easily ruin a day. If you are not used to canabis it can def be traumatic to be dosed like that.

This is crazy depending on dosage it will really fuck unknowing people up.

For reference I used to smoke a LOT but not anymore due to smoking giving me anxiety when the high hits.

So now I use edibles so I can gradually get high to not get the all at once rush like smoking does. I have 0 tolerance because I don't do it that much.

1 gummie bear I buy usually contains 50mg THC this is a fuckload for someone who doesn't have a tolerance it will put you on your ass. I was a mess the first time I ordered them thinking I could handle it, I could not it was intense but I was familiar with what was going on.

I now cut the gummies into quarters and it's nice and relaxing.

Imagine if you were an unsuspecting person whos never known the effects of THC and now you are doing said 50mg. You would be fucked and think you are dying. This is a crazy fuck up.

posts.title: A South African woman is sentenced to life in prison for selling her young daughter
top_comments: A woman testified during the trial that Smith had told her she and the two men had sold Joshlin for around $1,000 to a traditional healer who wanted the child for her body parts.

In South Africa, it is called "Muti".

Witchdoctors are unfortunately still a thing in rural parts.

I followed the entire case through CapeTalk's coverage - and I 100% agree with the court - the judge was extremely sympathetic to the defendant and state - and he held the trial in the community multi-purpose centre, ensuring the community feels part of the trial as well.


The NPA did really good work here.

Unfortunately Joshlin is dead - I am 99% sure of this, since albino kids are highly sought after for their organs and skin.

The boyfriend and friend's friend are absolute trash, and the lady who ratted on them are trash as well for not coming forward earlier. Fuck them.

Joshlin's grandmother fought tooth and nail to get custody of Joshlin and her siblings before this happened, but the social services failed spectacularly - the grandma said that Joshlin's mother made their lives hell and abused and neglected all the kids - but still she retained custody for some ungodly reason.

This is a failure of state and a testament to the fact that South Africa do not care about their children - every day there's a story of a child found raped and murdered under some bush, and still nothing is being done by the government.
So uhhh where's Joshlin? Where is this "healer?"

She was 6 years old. Six years spent growing, developing a personality and being at the mercy of and surely loving her mother. Her mother who then sold her for $1000. Beyond cruel. Unimaginable. And still not found a year later. I really hope her suffering was short. There aren’t words for this type of cruelty towards a child.

I'm speechless a parent would do that to their own child. 

Just horrifying that someone would sell a child to be murdered. 

I have three little girls 5 is the oldest. When I tell them monsters aren't real, I'm lying. They are real, they just don't look like what they expect.
This literally made my stomach turn. Wtaf?!
I saw a documentary about albinos being killed for ritualistic purposes. This one dude was like let them try me, all the while swinging two machetes around…. Wild stuff

I found out one of my childhood friends got all fucked up on meth & got caught trying to sell his kid.

Who knew Northern MN and S. Africa had so much in common.

As a South African I’m disgusted by this woman’s actions and how she played to courts and society in the beginning. 

Karma will not be kind to her. 

The community needs to find the muti doctors and do kangaroo court with them as the police are not effective.
